articles.title: Moderna COVID-19 vaccine distribution started in Canada by FedEX, Innomar Strategies - Devdiscourse
articles.description:
The government separately announced on Thursday that the first doses of the Moderna vaccine had arrived in Canada.
It approved the vaccine on Wednesday and said it expects 168,000 doses by end of 2020.  FedEx and Innomar Strategies have been hired by Canada t…
